main.name: Md Arif Hossain
main.description: I create software, design websites, code beautifully simple things, make ideas happen, and I love what I do.
main.bio: Hello! I'm Arif, a programmer with a good level of expertise in Front End Web Development. I'm currently studying at Southwest Forestry University pursuing a degree in Bachelor of Science under the Department of Computer Science and Technology. I love Programming and tech-related stuff. I like to write blogs about web-related things. I'm interested in MERN(Mongo, Express, React, NodeJS) Web Development. Now-a-days, I'm try to do something with Deno.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get help or anything else.

tools.name: Git
tools.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in small teams and have toyed around with contributing to Open Source Projects.

tools.name: Java
tools.description: Java was my first programming language that I started using in college years ago. It is by far the language I am most familiar with in terms of data-structure and algorithm programming.

tools.name: React Js
tools.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template (link below in portfolio) which I used as a starting point for this personal site.

tools.name: Node JS
tools.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice. The bulk of my experience with it has been in conjunction with MeteorJS-based projects

tools.name: Bootstrap 4
tools.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is the framework I am most familiar with and can therefore design more quickly than with others.

tools.name: MongoDB
tools.description: I have used many different database systems and am better educated and experienced with Relational Databases. However, for many applications, the ease of use of MongoDB better suits my needs and it is much more enjoyable to work with

tools.name: Heroku
tools.description: I use Heroku as my hosting platform for most of my projects because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

testimonials.text: Arif is a passionate JavaScript developer and has an excellent work ethic. Besides being an avid learner, he is also very hard working. He is also strict about his deadlines. I believe he will be an asset to any team.
Arif is a Passionate web developer. He is an expert in React Js, Javascript, Python & many frameworks. I was wondering about his skills. Highly recommended for Any Types of web development work.
